---
title: "`r params$rpt_title`"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
params:
   rpt_elemnts: NA
   rpt_title: "Google Form Summary"
output: html_document

---

```{css echo = FALSE}
h1 {
  font-weight:bold;
  font-size:26px;
  color:#3c763d;
  margin-top:2em;
}
h1.title {
  font-size:30px;
  color:black;
}
h2 {
  font-weight:bold;
  font-size:22px;
  color:#286090;
}
h3, p.qtext {
  font-weight:bold;
  font-size:18px;
  margin-top:2em;
}
h4.date {
  font-size:90%;
  color:#444;
  font-style:italic;
}
p.qtext1 {
  font-size:18px;
  font-weight:bold;
  font-style:italic;
  margin-top:2em;
  color:#286090;
}
p.desc {
  color:black;
  font-size:14px;
}
p.howmany {
  color:black;
  font-size:14px;
  font-style:italic;
  color:#286090;
}
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(htmltools)
library(knitr)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
html_taglist <- wu_gfr_taglist(params$rpt_elemnts)

## Print all the HTML tags outside the loop so they are at the top level
htmltools::tagList(html_taglist)

```
